sentences.sContent: Carpenter is free on bail while he appeals his conviction.
sentences.sCn: 卡彭特取保获释，同时对判决提出上诉。

sentences.sContent: She was murdered by a man who was out on bail for rape.
sentences.sCn: 她被一名犯强奸罪获保在外的男子杀害。

sentences.sContent: The three men were released on bail pending an appeal.
sentences.sCn: 这三名男子获准保释等候上诉。

sentences.sContent: He is not likely to be granted bail .
Carter has been refused bail and will remain in custody.
sentences.sCn: 卡特已经被拒绝保释，继续拘押。

sentences.sContent: The judge ordered that Jones be held without bail .
sentences.sCn: 法官下令琼斯不得保释。

sentences.sContent: Why can’t you ask your father to put up bail for you?
sentences.sCn: 为什么不能叫你父亲帮你交保释金？

sentences.sContent: Two of the defendants jumped bail and fled to New York.
sentences.sCn: 两名被告弃保潜逃到了纽约。
